title: FireFox using more memory (ram) then usual
content: Firefox suddenly started using more memory overtime like than i doubled check both in chrome and firefox like in chrome it is staying at a certain amount of memory for whole day and in fire fox it just starting to use more memory like i started using firefox because chrome is using high memory and now firefox suddenly started and it is not even staying at a certain amount of memeroy in ram so yeah i think its a glicth in new firefox update and if u fixed that than i can come on firefox again but now i am using chrome.
creator: jutfrfunfun

title: Cannot view source code of http websites
content:
When I press CTRL + U on a http website to view the source code, it comes up with an error message saying that there is a potential security risk ahead. Even if I try to change the https that Firefox has recently started to insert in view-source URLs, it still doesn't allow me to view the source code of the website.

Firefox is the only browser that I know of that does this. Google Chrome allows you to view the website's source code, even if the website's URL begins with http. This hasn't always been the case, but it has been the case since I last updated Firefox.
creator: calumchilds

title: How to remove "Alternative Language"
content: I want to remove Korean from my "Set Alternative Languages" setting in Firefox but I can't because the "remove" button is greyed out. It's annoying because when I want to do things like close all tabs, or split my screen, or when I access Finder from Firefox, the words are in Korean and I want to remove it. How do I do this?

title: Firefox Account Login Problems
content:
I recently got a new computer and downloaded Firefox to it and proceeded to sign in to Firefox sync. A few months ago I changed my email (which I will refer to as email 1) to a new email (email 2).

When I try to sign in using email 2, I enter the password and it asks me to check my email for a code. I enter the code in and suddenly I'm back to the password screen, only this time it says "incorrect password" and shows email 1. No password I have in my books seems to work on either email 1 or email 2.

I don't want to lose my data, so I would rather not reset my password...
creator: supernova17

title: Audio doesnt work, but video does
content:
Whenever I try to play a video, the video plays perfectly but there isnt any audio. It took me a while to recognize this problem because the audio works perfectly in youtube 

I have already cleared the cookies and the cache, I have made sure to allow DRM protected videos, I have made sure to allow autoplay of media with sound in all websites, but nothing has fixed it yet
creator: sv.y4zmin

title: Browser error keeps occuring on GoToTraining platform.
content:
This is the error message I keep getting every time the page tries to refresh or change screens. I don't know how to correct it. Please help!

"The page isn’t redirecting properly.

Firefox has detected that the server is redirecting the request for this address in a way that will never complete. 

   This problem can sometimes be caused by disabling or refusing to accept cookies."

This just started about 2 weeks ago. Thank you!
